page.title: 10Victoria Hospital,Kirkcaldy
page.content: The{Victoria Hospital}was built in three phases.Phase 1 was opened in 1880 by Princess Royal.It had beds for around 100 patients, with only 5 nursing staff.Phase two was opened in 1967.It consisted of a 14 storey tower block.The third and final phase was opened in 1983.This was a separate building for psychiatric and geriatric patients.This raised the number of beds available to 640,although there are usually only 580 patients in the hospital with over 150 medical staff and 100 clerical staff. The hospital has five main operating theatres with two available to carry out minor operations. The hospital can carry out many kinds of operations but patients must be taken to the larger hospital in Edinburgh for brain operations if anyone sustains head injuries in a crash.
